recordTypes.name: Commercial Building Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required for all commercial and non-residential construction.

recordTypes.name: Condo Conversion Permit
recordTypes.description: A Condominium Conversion Permit is required to convert traditional real estate to condominiums.

recordTypes.name: Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: A Demolition Permit is required remove existing structures, i.e. sheds, garages, houses, etc.

recordTypes.name: Home Occupation Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required to establish, expand or alter a home occupation (home-based business).

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description: Plumbing permits are required in the Town of York for all residential and commercial internal plumbing work.

recordTypes.name: Residential Building Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required for the construction, alteration or expansion of any residential structure greater than 200 sq. ft., or includes any activity which requires inspection by the CEO.

recordTypes.name: Seasonal Conversion of Dwelling Permit
recordTypes.description: A Seasonal Conversion Permit is required to convert a dwelling unit from a seasonal use to a year-round use.

recordTypes.name: Shoreland Permit
recordTypes.description: You must have a shoreland permit for any activity on land or buildings within the Shoreland Overlay. This includes expanding or restarting a use that no longer meets current rules. A permit is also required for activities like removing vegetation, cutting trees, or filling and grading the land.

recordTypes.name: Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required for on-premise business advertising signs, and temporary off-premise advertising signs.

recordTypes.name: Solar Energy System Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required for all new, modified or expanded residential and non-residential solar energy systems.

recordTypes.name: Standby Generator Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required for standby generators and associated equipment.

recordTypes.name: Subsurface Wastewater Disposal System Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required anytime a subsurface wastewater system is being modified or installed, or a septic tank is being replaced or added.

recordTypes.name: Swimming Pool, Spa and Hot Tub Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required for the installation or construction of residential and non-residentia,l in-ground or above-ground, swimming pools, spas, hot tubs, etc.

recordTypes.name: Use Permit
recordTypes.description: A Use permit or Route One Use permit (applicable to all Route One base zones) is required to establish a new use, or modify or expand an existing use.

recordTypes.name: Wetland Permit
recordTypes.description: A Wetland Permit is required for any use, fill or alteration of a wetland. However, property owners do not need a permit if they are only cutting trees for personal use, such as firewood.

recordTypes.name: Wireless Communications Facilities Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required for all commercial and non-residential construction.

categories.name: Permitting and Inspections - Building Department
categories.content: Apply for permits, manage your applications, pay online, schedule inspections, and more.
